APPLICATION_ERROR.title: Oops, Something Went Wrong
APPLICATION_ERROR.body: We're experiencing a technical issue. Please try again later or contact support.

BAD_PASSWORD.title: Incorrect Password
BAD_PASSWORD.body: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

CREATE_USER_SUCCESS.title: Account Created!
CREATE_USER_SUCCESS.body: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in.

EMAIL_CODE_REQUIRED.title: Email Verification Needed
EMAIL_CODE_REQUIRED.body: Please check your email for a verification code to complete your action.

INVALID_ACCESS.title: Access Denied
INVALID_ACCESS.body: You don't have permission to perform this action.

INVALID_OTP_CODE.title: Invalid Verification Code
INVALID_OTP_CODE.body: The verification code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

INVALID_PASSWORD.title: Invalid Password
INVALID_PASSWORD.body: The password doesn't meet the requirements. Please review the password guidelines.

NEW_PASSWORD_REQUIRED.title: Password Update Required
NEW_PASSWORD_REQUIRED.body: Please create a new password to continue.

OTP_REQUIRED.title: Verification Code Needed
OTP_REQUIRED.body: Please enter the verification code sent to your email or phone.

REFRESH_TOKEN_FAIL.title: Session Expired
REFRESH_TOKEN_FAIL.body: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

SERVER_ERROR.title: Server Error
SERVER_ERROR.body: We're having some trouble on our end. Please try again later.

UNAUTHORIZED.title: Authorization Required
UNAUTHORIZED.body: Please log in to access Thundr again.

USERNAME_EXISTS.title: Username Unavailable
USERNAME_EXISTS.body: This username is already taken. Please choose a different one.

INCORRECT_USER_OR_PASSWORD.title: Incorrect user or password
INCORRECT_USER_OR_PASSWORD.body: You user or password might be incorrect, please try again.

UPSERT_COMPATIBILITY_ANSWER_SUCCESS.title: Compatibility Updated
UPSERT_COMPATIBILITY_ANSWER_SUCCESS.body: Your compatibility answers have been saved successfully.

UPSERT_CUSTOMER_DETAILS_SUCCESS.title: Profile Updated
UPSERT_CUSTOMER_DETAILS_SUCCESS.body: Your profile information has been updated.

UPLOAD_CUSTOMER_PHOTO_SUCCESS.title: Photo Uploaded
UPLOAD_CUSTOMER_PHOTO_SUCCESS.body: Your profile photo has been uploaded successfully.

UPDATE_CUSTOMER_FILTER_SUCCESS.title: Filters Updated
UPDATE_CUSTOMER_FILTER_SUCCESS.body: Your search filters have been updated.

UPDATE_CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_SUCCESS.title: Settings Saved
UPDATE_CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_SUCCESS.body: Your account settings have been updated.

UPSERT_CUSTOMER_SURVEY_SUCCESS.title: Survey Submitted
UPSERT_CUSTOMER_SURVEY_SUCCESS.body: Thank you for submitting your survey responses.

DELETE_NON_EXISTING_COGNITO_USER_SUCCESS.title: Account Status Updated
DELETE_NON_EXISTING_COGNITO_USER_SUCCESS.body: The account status has been updated in our records.

INVALID_QUESTION.title: Invalid Question
INVALID_QUESTION.body: There was a problem with the question format. Please try again or contact support.

INVALID_ANSWER.title: Invalid Answer
INVALID_ANSWER.body: The provided answer is not in a valid format. Please review and try again.

CUSTOMER_ERROR.title: Customer Error
CUSTOMER_ERROR.body: An error occurred with customer data. Please try again or contact support.

INVALID_COMPATIBILITIES_EXCEPTION.title: Compatibility Error
INVALID_COMPATIBILITIES_EXCEPTION.body: There was an issue processing compatibility settings. Please try again or contact support.

MAX_PROFILE_PHOTO_EXCEEDED.title: Photo Limit Reached
MAX_PROFILE_PHOTO_EXCEEDED.body: You've reached the maximum number of profile photos. Please delete some to add more.

MATCH_EXCEPTION.title: Match Error
MATCH_EXCEPTION.body: We're having some trouble finding matches right now. Please try again later.

MAX_SWIPES.title: Daily Swipes Reached
MAX_SWIPES.body: You've reached your daily swipe limit. Come back tomorrow for more!

POSSIBLES_COOLDOWN_EXCEPTION.title: Take a Break
POSSIBLES_COOLDOWN_EXCEPTION.body: You're viewing profiles a bit too quickly. Please slow down for a bit.
